activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11751
activity.text:
### Comment to be posted on Issue #11751

Hi @Jacobjeevan ,

I'd love to work on this issue.

**Proposed Solution**:
- Implement a scheduled job (e.g., cron task) that runs daily to check all appointments with:
  - `status: "booked"` and  
  - `appointmentDate < currentDate`.
- Based on the business logic, update the status to `"completed"` or `"missed"`.
- Ensure the update is cleanly handled in the backend (or frontend logic if applicable).
- Optionally trigger notifications if required.

**Proposed Solution**:
I will fix it within 24 hours after I get assigned

Let me know if there's any existing function or preferred structure you'd like me to follow. Looking forward to contributing!
